items.title: Oppo Reno15 goes global with Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC
items.summary: The Oppo Reno15 Pro Max and Reno15 Pro were just launched in Taiwan. Alongside them, Oppo also debuted a Reno15 model, which appears to be a rebranded Reno15c that was unveiled in China last month. Oppo also sells a Reno15 in China, which features a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset. Meanwhile, the gâ€¦

items.title: Boulter turns to Sharapova's former coach Joyce
items.summary: Katie Boulter turns to Michael Joyce, former coach of Maria Sharapova, as she attempts to climb back up the world rankings.

items.title: Get 25% off a vibrant MSI 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor with blistering 240Hz refresh rate â€” now $772, panel offers 3-year burn-in warranty in new year offer
items.summary: This big, beautiful 32-inch MSI MPG 321URX QD-OLED gaming monitor is on sale for just $772.99 right now, saving you 26% on its usual price.

items.title: Infinix Note Edge passes through the FCC, has some of its specs confirmed
items.summary: A couple of days ago an image leaked showing the upcoming Infinix Note Edge, which is rumored to become official before the end of this month. Now, the phone has been certified by the FCC with the model number X6887. It supports 5G, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth, NFC, GPS, GLONASS, BDS, Galileo, SBAS, and eveâ€¦

items.title: Patriot Viper PV593 4TB SSD Review â€” The Viper stays sleeping
items.summary: The Patriot Viper PV593 is perfectly good on paper and delivers satisfactory marks but doesnâ€™t quite close the deal.

items.title: LG announces the ‘worldâ€™s lightest 17-inch RTX laptop’
items.summary: We should get more information about the upcoming 2026 LG Gram Pro series at CES. LG is teasing the 2026 Gram Pro laptops that will be fully unveiled at CES, including what the company claims is the "world's lightest 17-inch RTX laptop." The LG Gram Pro 17 (17Z90UR) and Gram Pro 16 (16Z90U) will inâ€¦

items.summary: Fender Audio, the consumer electronics brand owned by the famous guitar maker, has announced its first pair of wireless headphones at CES 2026. What sets the Mix headphones apart from the competition are impressive battery life, a modular design that allows the ear cups and headband to be swapped tâ€¦

items.title: What to expect at CES 2026
items.summary: The biggest tech show of the year kicks off next week, as some of the industry's top players show up to Las Vegas for CES 2026. We'll be there to see all the new product demos we can and to bring you the most exciting news from the show. Follow our coverage for a preview of all the new tech these câ€¦

items.title: The Clicks Communicator is a Blackberry for your phone
items.summary: A QWERTY keyboard and interchangeable back plates. You ever find yourself thinking, "I wish my phone had a phone?" Good news, friend. Clicks - the company behind the QWERTY keyboard case for your iPhone - has just the thing: the Clicks Communicator. It's intended as a kind of complement to your smaâ€¦

items.title: The Clicks Power Keyboard is also a backup battery for your phone
items.summary: It might be just my type. Clicks is expanding beyond keyboard cases and bringing its QWERTY keys for phones to another format: a magnetic power bank accessory with a slide-out keyboard. The Power Keyboard offers a 2150mAh battery that can top off a phone battery via MagSafe or Qi2 wireless chargingâ€¦

items.title: 'Our standards are high' - Le Bris proud after Man City draw
items.summary: Sunderland manager Regis Le Bris discusses his team's high standards as they extend their unbeaten home record at the Stadium of Light after a 0-0 draw against Manchester City.

items.title: Man City held by stubborn Sunderland in entertaining draw
items.summary: Manchester City fall four points behind Arsenal in the Premier League title race after being held to a goalless draw by Sunderland, who maintain their unbeaten home record.

items.title: Ovation on Brentford return 'special' - Frank
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur manager Thomas Frank spoke on his joy at being welcomed back by the crowd at Bournemouth, where he spent nine years coaching.

items.title: Littler races into semis but Humphries knocked out
items.summary: Luke Littler beats Krzysztof Ratajski to reach the PDC World Championship semi-finals, before second seed Luke Humphries loses to Gian van Veen.

items.title: Romero fortunate to avoid 'easy' red card - Andrews
items.summary: Brentford manager Keith Andrews takes issue with the decision not to award a foul or show a red card for the potential denial of a goalscoring opportunity for Cristian Romero's challenge on Igor Thiago in a 0-0 draw with Spurs.

items.title: 'It's a tough place to come' - Guardiola on Sunderland draw
items.summary: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola praises Sunderland's performance after his team was held to a goalless at the Stadium of Light.

items.title: Leeds hold Liverpool to goalless draw at Anfield
items.summary: Liverpool draw 0-0 with Leeds to start 2026 with their first goalless draw of Arne Slot's tenure at Anfield.

items.title: Cairney scores stunning late equaliser for Fulham at Palace
items.summary: Tom Cairney scores late to earn Fulham a 1-1 draw and extend Crystal Palace's winless run across competitions.

items.title: Spurs draw on Frank's return to Brentford
